MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual string GuidColumnDefault { get; }
.property instance string GuidColumnDefault
Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property GuidColumnDefault As String
member this.GuidColumnDefault : string

Docs.summary: Returns the column default value to use for store-generated GUID columns when no default value is explicitly specified in the migration. Returns newsequentialid() for on-premises SQL Server 2005 and later. Returns newid() for SQL Azure.
Docs.value: Either newsequentialid() or newid() as described above.

MemberSignature.Value: protected void Statement (string sql, bool suppressTransaction = false, string batchTerminator = null);
.method familyhidebysig instance void Statement(string sql, bool suppressTransaction, string batchTerminator) cil managed
Protected Sub Statement (sql As String, Optional suppressTransaction As Boolean = false, Optional batchTerminator As String = null)
member this.Statement : string * bool * string -> unit

Docs.param: The statement to be executed.

Gets or sets a value indicating whether this statement should be performed outside of the transaction scope that is used to make the migration process transactional. If set to true, this operation will not be rolled back if the migration process fails.
The batch terminator for the database provider.
Docs.summary: Adds a new Statement to be executed against the database.

member this.StatementBatch : string * bool -> unit

Docs.param: The SQL to split into one ore more statements to be executed.

Gets or sets a value indicating whether this statement should be performed outside of the transaction scope that is used to make the migration process transactional. If set to true, this operation will not be rolled back if the migration process fails.
Docs.summary: Breaks sql string into one or more statements, handling T-SQL utility statements as necessary.

MemberSignature.Value: protected static System.Data.Entity.Migrations.Utilities.IndentedTextWriter Writer ();
.method familystatic hidebysig class System.Data.Entity.Migrations.Utilities.IndentedTextWriter Writer() cil managed
Protected Shared Function Writer () As IndentedTextWriter
static member Writer : unit -> System.Data.Entity.Migrations.Utilities.IndentedTextWriter

Docs.summary: Gets a new that can be used to build SQL. This is just a helper method to create a writer. Writing to the writer will not cause SQL to be registered for execution. You must pass the generated SQL to the Statement method.
Docs.returns: An empty text writer to use for SQL generation.
